document_data.name: Barley
document_data.mainbody: '''Barley''' was a type of [[grass]] cultivated for a cereal grain.

Availability.Beyond Faer√ªn: * In the [[Hordelands]], barley was one of main food crops grown in the countries of [[Khazari]] and [[Ra-Khati]].
Availability.Beyond Toril:
* In [[Arborea]], the [[plane]] considered by many to be the "breadbasket" of the [[Outer Planes]], one could find many fields of barley.<ref>
* In the [[Outlands]], fields of barley could be found in [[Tir na Og]].<ref>

document_data.History: The year [[233 DR]] was marked by a bountiful barley harvest in the lands surrounding the Inner Sea, making good [[beer]] easier to find in the region.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: According to [[Shou]] legends, barley was once a plentiful crop in the province of [[Chukei]].
document_data.Trivia: The [[deity]] [[Bimasara]] of Ra-Khati's [[Padhran religion]] was typically depicted with one hand holding a sheath of barley.
